Name: Characterization and Treatment of Adolescent Depression (CAT-D)
HowToAcknowledge: When using this data, please cite Sadeghi et al., Mood and Behaviors of Adolescents With Depression in a Longitudinal Study Before and During the COVID-19 Pandemic, 2022,  and  Camp et al., Test-retest reliability of functional connectivity in depressed adolescents, 2023 and include the following: 'This data was obtained from the OpenNeuro database.'
Funding: This research was supported by the Intramural Research Program of NIMH/National Institutes of Health (NIH; ZIA-MH002957-01 to A.S.). Curation of this dataset used computational resources from the National Institutes of Health High-Performance Computing Biowulf Cluster (http://hpc.nih.gov).
